title: Voluntary deduction and withholding of state income
context: [ยง235-69] Voluntary deduction and withholding of state income tax from unemployment compensation. An individual receiving unemployment compensation benefits under chapter 383 may elect to have state income tax deducted and withheld from the individual&rsquo;s payment of unemployment compensation at the rate of five per cent in accordance with section 383-163.6. [L 1996, c 157, ยง1]
